original_text: so that you, your children and their children after them may fear the Lord your God as long as you live by keeping all his decrees and commands that I give you, and so that you may enjoy long life.
korean_text: 곧 너와 네 아들과 네 손자들이 평생에 네 하나님 여호와를 경외하며 내가 너희에게 명한 그 모든 규례와 명령을 지키게 하기 위한 것이며 또 네 날을 장구하게 하기 위한 것이라

sentences.original_text: so that you may fear the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 너희 하나님 여호와를 경외하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: you, your children and their children after them
by keeping all his decrees and commands
and so that you may enjoy long life
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 오래 살게 하려 함이라
